meta.name: Channel banks
meta.brief: A sparse series of channel banks.

meta.name: Channel Bank
meta.brief: A single channel bank, holding up to 128 Channels.

meta.name: Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single FM or DMR channel.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the reception frequency.

meta.name: TX Frequency Offset
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit frequency offset.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in 10Hz. The offset direction is stored separately.

meta.name: Repeater Mode
meta.brief: Specifies the offset direction for the repeater mode.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.brief: Specifies the bandwidth of the FM channel. DMR channels are always 12.5kHz wide.

meta.name: Transmit power
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit power of the channel.

meta.name: Channel mode
meta.brief: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Enable RX only
meta.brief: If enabled, no transmission is possible on this channel.

meta.name: RX Tone CTCSS
meta.brief: Same codes as for TX

meta.name: Custom CTCSS frequency
meta.brief: Specifies a custom CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Two-tone decode index
meta.brief: Specifies the two-tone decode index.

meta.name: Transmit contact index
meta.brief: Contact index, 0-based.

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.brief: Scan list index, 0-based.

meta.name: DMR Encryption index
meta.brief: Index +1, 0=off.

meta.name: Channel extension banks
meta.brief: A series of channel extension banks corresponding to each encoded channel bank.

meta.name: Channel extension bank
meta.brief: Encodes several channel extensions corresponding to each encoded channel.

meta.name: FM APRS TX delay
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit FM APRS delay in multiple of 20ms. Valid values are 0-5100ms.

meta.name: FM APRS sub tone type
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit sub-tone for FM APRS.

meta.name: FM APRS DCS code
meta.brief: Least significant 9bit encodes the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes inverted DCS.

meta.name: Manual TX interval
meta.brief: Specifies the manual TX interval in second. 0: Off, 1-255.

meta.name: Automatic TX interval
meta.brief: Specifies the interval in multiples of 30s. 0:Off. Valid values 30-7650s.

meta.name: APRS monitor enable
meta.brief: Listen to the APRS packet transmission.

meta.name: Latitude degree
meta.brief: Encodes the first position latitude degree value.

meta.name: APRS path string 0-14h
meta.brief: First half of the APRS path string. Contains the first 24 bytes.

meta.name: APRS symbol table
meta.brief: A char!

meta.name: APRS symbol
meta.brief: A char!

meta.name: Prewave delay
meta.brief: Specifies the pre-wave delay in multiples of 10ms. Valid values are 0-2550ms.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: 0-based transmit channel. 0fa0=VFO A, 0fa1=VFO B, 0fa2=Current

meta.name: APRS display duration
meta.brief: Specifies the time, an APRS message is shown. Stored as 3s + n seconds.

meta.name: APRS path 15h-38h
meta.brief: Second half of the APRS path.

meta.name: Fixed altitude
meta.brief: Encodes the fixed altitude in feet.

meta.name: Enable AX.25 CRC check
meta.brief: If disabled, the all decoded AX.25 frames are processed, even those with invalid CRCs.

meta.name: Orbital Element Sets
meta.brief: Holds the orbital elements for some sattelites.

meta.name: Orbital Element
meta.brief: Holds the (TLE) orbital elements for a single sat.

meta.name: Satellite Name
meta.brief: Simple ASCII string.
meta.description: Unused chars are stored as space.

meta.name: Epoch Year
meta.brief: The two-digit year with leading 0.

meta.name: Epoch Julien Day
meta.brief: Fractional Julien day in format ddd.ffffffff. The 3-digit ddd part is the day of year with leading zeros, while the 8-digit ffffffff encodes the fractional part of the day.

meta.name: First derivative mean motion
meta.brief: Encodes the fractional value as s.ffffffff, where s is the sign. Either " " or "-" and the 8-digit field ffffffff contains the fractional part.

meta.name: Inclination
meta.brief: Ecodes the inclination in degrees as ddd.ffff, where 3-digit ddd is the integer part. Leading zeros are not stored but replaced with spaces (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit ffff is the fractional part.

meta.name: Right ascension of the ascending node
meta.brief: Ecodes the ascension in degrees as ddd.ffff, where 3-digit ddd is the integer part. Leading zeros are not stored but replaced with spaces (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit ffff is the fractional part.

meta.name: Eccentricity
meta.brief: Stores the fractional part of the eccentricity as a 7-digit number with leading zeros.

meta.name: Argument of perigee
meta.brief: Stores the argument of perigee in degrees, stored as ddd.ffff. The 3-digit ddd field holds the integer part, where leading zeros are stored as space (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit ffff field holds the fractional part.

meta.name: Mean anomaly
meta.brief: Stores the mean anomaly in degrees as ddd.ffff. The 3-digit ddd part holds the integer part, where leading zeros are replaced by space (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit field ffff contains the fractional part.

meta.name: Mean motion
meta.brief: Encodes the mean motion as dd.ffffffff. The 2-digit field dd encodes the integer part, where leading zeros are stored as space (ASCII 20h). The 8-digit ffffffff part encodes the fractional part.

meta.name: Revolution number at epoch
meta.brief: Encodes the revoution number as 5-digit field ddddd. Leading zeros are stored.

meta.name: FM Downlink Frequency
meta.brief: Stores the frequency in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: FM Uplink Frequency
meta.brief: Stores the frequency in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Uplink DCS code
meta.brief: The least significant 9 bit encode the DCS code 000h-1ffh. The 10-th bit encodes the inversion flag. That is D023I is encoded as 0213h, and D777I as 03ffh.

meta.name: Downlink DCS
meta.brief: The least significant 9 bit encode the DCS code 000h-1ffh. The 10-th bit encodes the inversion flag. That is D023I is encoded as 0213h, and D777I as 03ffh.
